name: Flocks of Socks
description:
Don't you hate doing laundry, with all the odd socks everywhere? WHAT IF THERE WERE A FLOCK OF SOCKS YOU HAD TO PAIR! Originally developed to be played with Joycons, this version uses a single Xbo 360 controller that can be shared between 2 players, for some coop sorting fun. Pair up with a friend and pair up as many different pairs of socks as you can in 20 seconds Move the hands around with the joysticks and grab a sock with the triggers. Move the socks together and collect a pair. Rinse and repeat!

Credits:
